TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IApplicationIdentifier

summary.span: 指定應用程式定義域的識別項，此識別項可供快取實作用來與主機環境互動。

span.span: Defines an identifier for application domains that a cache implementation can use to interact with a host environment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]可以使用主機環境，例如 ASP.NET介面來定義識別個別應用程式定義域的字串。A [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] host environment such as ASP.NET can use the interface to define strings that identify individual application domains. 主機環境實作介面。The host environment implements the interface. 這個介面就可以使用透過實作屬性。This interface is then available to implementations through the property. 快取實作會使用這個參考來取得應用程式定義域的識別項。A cache implementation uses this reference to obtain an identifier for the application domain. 在 ASP.NET 中，快取實作會使用應用程式識別碼，來建構快取效能計數器的識別碼。In ASP.NET, cache implementations use the application identifier to construct identifiers for cache performance counters. 這會提供效能名稱可以執行多個應用程式定義域時，應用程式定義域之間區別的計數器執行個體。This provides names for performance counter instances that can be distinguished between application domains when multiple application domains are running.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetApplicationId() cil managed

summary.span: 取得應用程式定義域的識別項。

span.span: Gets an identifier for an application domain.

returns.span: 目前應用程式定義域的唯一識別項。

span.span: A unique identifier for the current application domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通常由實作[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]才能建構應用程式識別項的主機環境實作。The method is typically implemented by a [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] host environment in order to construct an application identifier for an implementation. A實作會使用這項資訊來識別目前正在執行的應用程式定義域。A implementation uses this information to identify the application domain that is currently running. 比方說，在 ASP.NET 中，快取會使用應用程式識別碼來建構快取效能計數器的識別碼。For example, in ASP.NET, the cache uses an application identifier to construct identifiers for cache performance counters. 快取呼叫由主機環境和主機所實作的方法傳回的識別項。The cache calls the method that is implemented by the host environment and the host returns the identifier. 這會提供效能名稱可以執行多個應用程式定義域時，應用程式定義域之間區別的計數器執行個體。This provides names for performance counter instances that can be distinguished between application domains when multiple application domains are running.
